Reviews.Title: Incredibly awesome!
Reviews.Author: Ultra 64

} cv_mo2RV7DX7X9SOD3loadSwf_Core(swfLocation, swfWidth, swfHeight, flashVersion, bgColor, swfParams, flashParams, embedAttributes); return false; } function cv_mo2RV7DX7X9SOD3loadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { return _cv_mo2RV7DX7X9SOD3loadSwf(movieID, playerVersion); } // ]]> var cv_mo2RV7DX7X9SOD3RollOverImg = new Image(); cv_mo2RV7DX7X9SOD3RollOverImg.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/91cbKxPudDS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play-active,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } var node = cv_mo2RV7DX7X9SOD3preplay.parentNode; var cv_mo2RV7DX7X9SOD3currentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo2RV7DX7X9SOD3currentClick) { return cv_mo2RV7DX7X9SOD3currentClick(); } } } Length:: 4:27 MinsMy seven-year-old laptop was on it's last legs, so I was shopping for a new one. I figured I'd shell out at least $600, so I researched for weeks. Finally, I wrote down some sku numbers of highly rated laptops, including this one, and went to BestBuy, and tried out all the laptops I was interested in. I NEVER thought I'd be buying the cheapest one there, and one with a Celeron processor?!?! Amazingly, this laptop was the one I chose, and I promise you it's worth it -- as long as you're not playing Crysis or something. I wanted a laptop that could run Photoshop, Fruityloops (music-making software), have a great display, surf the net fast, and be fast while running several applications. And it does! It is very fast, the display is AMAZINGLY bright and crisp, and it does all I want it to. I did just order another 4gb stick of RAM for forty bucks, but even without more RAM you'll still be very pleased. And it's only 229 at bestbuy. So, overall I got a super laptop with a total of 8GB RAM and a 500gb (!) hard drive for less than three hundred bucks! Now that's what I call AWESOME. The Three things that I didn't like (but are all repairable) was Windows 8's UI. It stinks big time. So I quickly switched to "classic" view and downloaded a startup button -- problem solved, runs and looks like Windows 7. Next, the sound card drivers STINK when you first buy this laptop -- no bass, tinny sound, horrible (even with headphones, no bass). Just Google Realtek HD Audio drivers and update the drivers -- problem solved, sounds excellent. Lastly, bloatware. Took about a half-hour to uninstall. Get rid of Norton, install free internet security software (I did ZoneAlarm). The battery will give you about 2.5 hours on a charge with brighter screen settings. I've rambled too much. Get this laptop, you won't regret it!UPDATE 11/17/13: Hello again everyone. Just wanted to give a quick update on the laptop. It's been two weeks since I bought it, and I am still just as pleased with it as when I first bought it. Still super fast, beautiful, and a pleasure to use.I've been getting lots of questions and comments from some very nice people, and I've heard nothing but good stuff from their experiences. I encourage you to read some of those comments about their experiences with this laptop.I wanted to make this computer my music-making machine, and it performs flawlessly. Just bought an Audio-Technica AT2020 USB Condenser USB Microphone and it worked the second I plugged it in. Running Audacity to record vocals (with media player running in the background) and again, works without a flaw. Rendering songs in Image-Line Software Image Line FL Studio Fruity Edition 11 is noticeably faster than my last laptop (also a duel-core).I transferred about 230gb of files from my backup external hard drive and was amazed at how fast the files transferred. Less than 15-20 minutes I believe.As with any new laptop, I've been hearing lots of complaints about Windows 8. It's just a bad interface (and OS in general) for a lot a people. There are, however, MANY options to customize your laptop to fit your needs. I needed a classic desktop view with icons, and I needed a start button. Easy to accomplish. I encourage everyone with questions regarding fixing Windows 8's functionality to consult Google. There are many very easy tutorials out there. Personally, now that I've customized my desktop, I don't mind Windows 8 at all. Just takes time to change everything around to your liking.Well, that's my update for now. Perhaps in a month or two I'll say some more. Thanks to everyone for the kind words you've sent me, I appreciate it very much:)

Reviews.Title: Unbeatable Value Computer
Reviews.Author: Computer Expert
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for my brother, who needed a computer to take with him to school and work. It was important that it was powerful enough to do all of the tasks he needed on the internet, word processing, graphic design and gaming. He didn't want a really expensive computer though, since he is always traveling with it. The screen looks really nice, the keyboard is convenient and comfortable and it is overall very sleak. I think that for the price, this is as good as it gets.  Although it won't run the most high-end games on the highest settings, it will run almost every game he's tried on it (sometimes the graphics details must be tweaked down). We use it to stream games to the television, and it pretty much does everything that is asked of it very quickly. It also runs cool, which is important! This computer has it all for a really decent price, and I would definitely recommend it! A+++++

Reviews.Title: Great computer at any price
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Ultra 64's comments and demo say it all.PS: If like me, you are not a fan of the Windows 8 metro interface, the first thing to do is install the free program "Classic Shell."  Classic shell will skip the the metro interface and go directly to the desktop while installing a customizable Start button. To avoid any chance of a virus, search "Cnet Classic Shell".  Cnet is a trusted, virus free provider of free and paid software.  Classic Shell does not come with any bloatware or require registration.  After installation, you can access metro the usual way by moving the cursor to the right edge of the page.  Classic Shell allows you to have full control of the menu or boot to the metro interface using its advanced options.

Reviews.Title: Great Price!! Even better computer!!
Reviews.Author: Jdub
Reviews.Content: For the price you really can't go wrong with this computer. It will handle all of your basic computing and internet needs with a little power to spare. Don't get me wrong if you are graphics junky this may not be the machine for you. But if you are the basic user (like me)that needs a reliable computer for writing reports and browsing the web this is the computer for you. Oh and did I mention you get a free pair of SkullCandy headphones as well. The only down side to this computer is the fact that it is running Windows 8 which takes some getting use to.

Reviews.Title: Great Budget Laptop but Amazon is charging too much for this model
Reviews.Author: Stephen M. Geraci "Steve-o"
Reviews.Content: Love Amazon, but I got this fantastic budget laptop at best buy for $229.00.  It is well worth the money.  I bought it for my daughter who is in college and it fits her needs perfectly.  On a side note, I'm not sure why Amazon can't be more competitive with their price on this product.  A hundred dollars less is significant in my world.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: bullies
Reviews.Content: Iv only had this 2 days But for the price it is a great laptop. And I may be the only one but I am really liking Windows 8.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great shipper!
Reviews.Author: RD
Reviews.Content: Wow, this is a great computer for the price. It has all the expected features and more +plus a wide screen and more than roomy keyboard. Great product, and great seller of the product! I highly recommend for basic Windows laptop (best value I have seen).

Reviews.Title: Good All Around EXCEPT for the DVD PLAYER TRAY.
Reviews.Author: cabbieiam
Reviews.Content: Good All Around EXCEPT for the DVD PLAYER TRAY.Latest UPDATE: Dec. 20. 2013.This unit is going back to the seller,only 38 days after I received it.The reason is this:I purchased for it 2 Memory boards, 8 ggb each.When I removed the only screw on its back to reach the Memory Slots,I could not open the lid all the way.It allowed me to lift it only half way,and that will not permit me to install the new memory boards.I checked with a Toshiba Tech, and he advised me not to force it,and instead to take it to a Best Buy like Store andlet them deal with it,BUT if they break it, it is on me.That is why it is going back.And my rating of it went down to ONE Star only.Meanwhile, I am moving all my folders, files and Picsto an external Hard Drive.================================================================It arrived on time, Nov.12.2013, and right away I put it to work.I set it up, installed KASPERSKY Anti Virus Internet Security 2014(US$ 27.00 delivered from COSTCO Online only,good thru the first week of Dec. 2013, CHECK it out},IOBIT MALWRE PROTECTION, ADVANCED SYSTEM CARE 7, Glary Utilities.I tried installing SKYPE, for some unknown reason, it did not work at all.I also installed CALENDAR MAGIC 18.0.Now, a few days later, when I tried to play a DVD movie,here was when I discovered and to my surprise,that to OPEN the drive Tray, I could not do it manually.This is due to an engineering shortsightedness.The latch is way down on the left side, where literally,I have to LIFT the computer up and reach to the latch,and this still did not work.I have to right Click on the DVD Drive icon and click <EJECT>;thus for this REASON, this laptop received from me only THREE STARS;other wise, it would have been a FULL FIVE STARS.I Chatted Online with the Toshiba.com Tech representativeon five occasions, and he was very informative and helpful.I am intending to upgrade its 4 GGB Memory, by adding another 8 GGB unit, thus giving me a 12 GGB Memory instead.Other wise, I am very pleased with this C55-A5300 Toshiba Laptop,and for the price I paid, just under US$ 300.00,I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great budget laptop
Reviews.Author: Aaron J. Graves
Reviews.Content: My 6 year old MacBook was starting to show its age. The battery was completely dead, in fact it had grown about a quarter inch thick lump on the underside. Not to mention, I couldn't really keep updating to the latest version of OS X due to barely meeting the new system requirements. I'd been running Linux on it the last few years anyways, and hadn't booted into OS X in as long.I'd been looking at laptops casually for a while at a local retailer, and had a desire to get a new one by or around Christmas time.I actually found a few locally on Craigslist that I considered buying, until my wife pointed me to this one. At the retailer I bought from, it was only $30 more than what I was trying to spend on Craigslist, so I figured why not? I ran to the store that night and picked one up. Aside from some initial frustrations in getting Windows Update to install all updates so I can upgrade to Windows 8.1, this laptop has been a dream.Despite what many people feel are lower specs, the "quality index" score or whatever Microsoft calls it was a 4.8, which handily blew away my wife's "better spec'ed" HP at 3.9. I'm not a computer gamer, but I've noticed no slowness at all using this laptop. The off to ready to log in time was about 13 seconds, which is slightly faster than what I was getting in Linux under my old MacBook (and HIGHLY improved for any Windows PC in my book).Bottom line, I'm very well pleased with this laptop. The only "grudge" I have against it (if you could call it that) is when you're holding it, it truly does feel "cheap." It's a very lightweight plastic, but to be honest I'm not at all concerned about it. The unit itself has performed well in the last week or so since I've owned it, and my recommendation has already caused another person to buy one.

Reviews.Title: Great budget PC
Reviews.Author: Michelle Taylor "Luxi"
Reviews.Content: Unbeatable for the price, surprisingly very fast. Great first computer for my 8 year old. He asked for one that will run Minecraft and after reading the helpful reviews on here especially from Ultra 64... I decided to buy it. I definitely have no regrets... Windows 8 was a little annoying but I upgraded it to 8.1 and actually think it will be very easy for my son to pick up. I tested Minecraft and was getting 30fps-65fps. I think my kid will love this. I am very happy and actually excited for his reaction on Christmas morning. Can't wait for that. And getting such a good deal made me a lot less stressed about finances and budgeting and all that xmas shopping. Now to find a tablet for my daughter >_< I definitely would recommend this especially as a first computer, it can handle what you throw at it and some light gaming. A great budget computer.

Reviews.Title: Sound and power problems - cannot recommend
Reviews.Author: bogmonkey
Reviews.Content: I can't recommend this laptop.It arrived and the sound was horrible out of the box...not from the laptop speakers themselves, the actual output sound signal (into headphones and external speakers) was tinny and lacking bass. Turns out this is a common problem. It was only solved by my research at Toshiba Forums. Shipping a laptop with such a problem (known) is bad policy. Took me an hour or more to finally figure it out. (If you are having this issue, search 'DTS Sound' on the laptop internal search screen and you can tweak the sound there)I ended up returning the laptop as the battery would not charge at all (another common problem from what I read on the forums). I tried all the software fixes and other tricks, but none worked. The laptop is of no use to me without a battery (though it functionedfine on plug power)Too many issues...I have opted to go with a similarly priced Dell unit. I use this only for internate and email, no fancy bells and whistles needed. My biggest regret was spending two hours installing Chrome and other specific programs I use, wiping off all the bloatware and useless apps to get the thing groomed peoperly - then discovering a bad battery requiring a return of the unit.

Reviews.Title: Great price , Reliable Laptop computer
Reviews.Author: CajunDavO
Reviews.Content: The laptop I purchased met everything I was looking for , in a portable computer . It was my first laptop purchase ever . Ordering was a snap , shipping from the distributor was great . For a computer I paid under $ 400 for very pleased . The Wi fi connection using my smart phones own HOT SPOT APP. was very convenient & very quick to set up . After hours of use the unit never heated up or drain the Battery . The Windows 8 programming though I'm not that computer savvy it was pretty easy to navigate thru & use . For myself it was a great buy , quality product , & within my thrifty budget . I did read many reviews , pros and cons . I did do additional research & found Toshiba had THE BEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK  & reliable source for long lasting computers . Enjoy , I know I will .

Reviews.Title: Laptop
Reviews.Author: JRDj
Reviews.Content: This is a great computer for the money.  Takes a little time to get used to with Windows 8 but with a "no charge" upgrade to Windows 8.1, this computer will last me a long time and still be current.  I chose this laptop for personal use only.

Reviews.Title: good computer
Reviews.Author: mike Karika
Reviews.Content: Works great. Very smooth running computer for basic needs and activities. No need for much more unless you do a ridiculous amount of high demanding programs.

Reviews.Title: Christmas:
Reviews.Author: Louise Hockenson
Reviews.Content: Bought this computer for my Grand daughter this year & she was very happy about it! Have one myself & Love it!

Reviews.Title: BATTERY DOES NOT WORK!!!
Reviews.Author: Julieta Fernandez
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop and it seemed to work well, until I figured out the battery is giving me a hard time. The computer does not work unless it is plugged in.

Reviews.Title: Great Budget Laptop
Reviews.Author: thegr8mouse77
Reviews.Content: I must say for the price this laptop performs quite well, I use it mainly for streaming videos and browsing. The only thing I dislike is the touchpad, alot of the times its unresponsive and does things I dont want it too, I would recommend using a mouse with it.

Reviews.Title: bought as a gift for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Kerensa Riley
Reviews.Content: she LOVES it......other then no Microsoft Office she LOVES IT! (but Office can be purchased) IF I ever need a laptop again I am for sure purchasing another Toshiba!!!

Reviews.Title: Battery will not charge
Reviews.Author: david m suchy
Reviews.Content: The computer arrived on time. It was a gift so It wasn't opened for 3 weeks after it was bought. The laptop will not recharge the battery. It says the battery is charging, however, it won't go above zero percent charged. As soon as you unplug it goes dead. No instructions with the computer.

Reviews.Title: was good
Reviews.Author: kaniamma
Reviews.Content: bought it for my son, it meet my child's expectation, that was what he wanted it was light weight compared to the HP laptop that he has. it has all the features that we expected and the price was good, working well so far.

Reviews.Title: Bargain Basement Laptop
Reviews.Author: glkventura
Reviews.Content: This is bare bones laptop that served my needs to perform as a integrated shipping platform for my ecommerce stores. WiFi capability, disk drive and multiple USB ports to connect scale and printers was all that was required. I find it surprising that it is listed here @ $400 when I was able to purchase it @ Best Buy for $229 during the Black Friday weekend. It just goes to show what the real margin must be. Either way, the laptop has out performed prior purchases that were 2X to 4X the cost.

Reviews.Title: Relatively Good, but Too Many Problems
Reviews.Author: Rachel Penningroth
Reviews.Content: This computer is a fair price for the inexperienced user. Once you get past learning how to use the poorly designed Windows 8 Set-Up you may feel frustrated. Everything you would want to do on your new computer requires new accounts on Microsoft. After that annoying fact pops up every fifteen minutes, then you get to experience the terribly slow operating speed and the glitches. I have had a seven year old laptop that moves faster than this one. Plus, it constantly freezes on the home screen. I often have to restart my computer multiple times to get it un-frozen. Yet more problems I have seen are as follows: you cannot play DVDs on this computer, the web cam is sub-par at best, any iPhone or Apple product will not cooperate with this laptop, downloading pictures is a long and infuriating task, the battery never holds a charge for longer than three hours, you cannot watch movies (as the screen will turn black), and the speakers are very quiet at its loudest. I highly recommend shelling out the cash for a better product such as a Mac.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite C55-A5300 15.6" Laptop PC
Reviews.Author: Joanne A. Wyman
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful laptop.  It makes a great gift.  Very pretty in black.  It also encludes a short instruction folder.  I would buy this again.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Matthew Moore
Reviews.Content: This being my third Toshiba Laptop I went for the best again. I will not hesitate to recommend it to family and friends

Reviews.Title: Great laptop especially for the money!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Tanner
Reviews.Content: Great processing speed, graphics, screen size and memory, especially for the money. It is more than enough computer to keep up with the needs of a high school student.

Reviews.Title: Battery is no good
Reviews.Author: kim fitzsimmons
Reviews.Content: The battery does NOT hold a charge and we almost did not receive the computer because they thought it shipped but it didn't. Thank goodness for fed-ex picking up on the error

Reviews.Title: soooo hard to use
Reviews.Author: Ingrid Dacres
Reviews.Content: It is a little bit complicated,i don't think it is user friendly.i got it for my mom and she is finding it a little difficult to use.

Reviews.Title: Good computer for the price
Reviews.Author: Jacquelyn Hawkinson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop when moving from a 3 bedroom to an RV. It is a good computer for the price, but difficult to get familiar with.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite C55-A5300 15.6" Laptop PC/Works GREAT after warranty Repair (exchanged Bad Battery)
Reviews.Author: A.W.
Reviews.Content: This Laptop PC is a Christmas Gift for my Grandchild, she's been happy to receive this gift, HOWEVER, I have come to realize it is NOT charging, The battery remains at a very low level....It could be the charging cord / Or it just may be that the Laptop itself is a defective one....I will call to arrange for an exchange Or even a Refund. whichever becomes necessary... update on how this is resolved to follow...UPDATE: On Dec.28, 2013 This Laptop was sent to the Toshiba Repair Depot,(I had to prepay for a shipment Box) after they verified that the battery was bad; They changed the battery & confirmed that the Laptop was in Good Working Condition. The Laptop was returned on January 8,2014 My Grand daughter says the Laptop is working very well. No problems with the DVD and she Skypes with other relatives. Great for completing her writing assignments. I have learned my lesson, I won't purchase from any more Third Party Sellers, I Will ONLY Buy from Amazon.BECAUSE OF THE OUTCOME I've Given THIS ITEM 4 Stars.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful and powerful
Reviews.Author: Hunter Gasaway
Reviews.Content: I had a crappy laptop that I bought from a pawn shop that I just grew tired of because it was slow and ran on Windows Vista....ya, you know my pain...anyways, I pressured my dad to buy this for me and I couldn't be happier with this computer. It looks pretty and sleek and has power under the board to match. Just for comparison purposes, I have a desktop tower that's been upgraded to play World of Warcraft, a game with high performance demands. It could play that game like nobody's business. However, some online games were laggy and slow when I tried to play them with the desktop. I went back and played them on this baby and they were smooth as butter. I recommend this product to anyone who happens across this review. Here soon I'm going to play some PC games and see how well they do. But I have no doubt they'll run just as smooth.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: John W.
Reviews.Content: Great laptop great with down loading movies and playing games on line and great for movie making DVD's and music CD's

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Laptop
Reviews.Author: Ann B. Sciba "retired librarian"
Reviews.Content: This seems so far to be a very good machine, even without a touch screen.  My USB mouse works just fine with it.I wish is could say the same for Windows 8.  This version of Windows is supposed to be more automatic but I'm finding that it isn't automatic at all, leaving me spending a lot of time trying to find where they've hidden ways to do things for myself!  I've been on Windows since 3.1 in 1988 and find this to be the worst ever!!!!!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Andrej Stipanovic
Reviews.Content: Delivering is precise, appropriate and fast. Very fast for my needs. I will recomend it to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: so disappointed
Reviews.Author: Jan M.
Reviews.Content: from the very first day this laptop has not worked properly. contacted amazon j c connection,toshiba tech several times It was determined to be a soft ware problem WHAT!tech support would not fix the problem unless I bought your plan for $150 plus. they took it back to factory setting.I really feel Ripped off by Toshiba. Still not as it should be, can't get on line half the time, & it jumps from one thing to another. Please get Americans to help with problems. help help HELP They won't take it back unless I pay %15 restocking sad situation

Reviews.Title: Excelent product for the price
Reviews.Author: Dwain McIntosh
Reviews.Content: This product is very good for the price, it perform all the necessary functions that it was made to accomplish

Reviews.Title: A Great Win 8 Laptop For The Price
Reviews.Author: M. Anaximenes
Reviews.Content: Picked this up as a gift for my daughter, for whom this is her first. With strong initial specs, Windows 8 and lots of room for upgrades, this PC is a winner at under $300. The first thing I did was upgrade the memory from the standard 4gb to 16gb using G. Skill DDR3 modules, which I'm sure will be of good use given her propensity for gaming. But even without the upgrade, this is a solid laptop for students, or as a family home PC.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop.
Reviews.Author: Pat K
Reviews.Content: Excellent laptop for the price! Nice screen, keyboard works great! This is a best buy for me and I highly recommend this computer!

Reviews.Title: Good Laptop but defective battery
Reviews.Author: Wayne Moore
Reviews.Content: Overall the computer has a nice feel to it works fine, very good budget system. It arrived very quickly. Problem, the battery was not functioning upon arrival and on checking the forums I found out that this a problem with the laptop. I called Toshiba customer service and after some attempts to tweek it was refered to a site where a replacement was ordered and sent to me. that replacement arrived quickly. The problem I have with Toshiba though is that they probably know of the problem and they should not hassle you. what I mean is when u order the replacement they would take your Credit card information and if you do not return the replacement within 30 days they would charge you. when I ask the company that delivered the battery if they would accept the old they told me no. Cant understand that so now I have to look around and see if someone is willing to make the delivery.

Reviews.Title: Meh and Meh
Reviews.Author: Ruth Morris
Reviews.Content: speakers are tinny and oh what is not to love  about a blue zillion Toshiba commercials that appear more frequently than my screen saver.  Alas the dilemma  of the budget un-enhanced.

Reviews.Title: Really like this one
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: This is a great laptop....it's fast and does everything I need...Plus I just bought it at Best Buy for $229!

Reviews.Title: Dear Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Jason P. Lackey
Reviews.Content: Dear Toshiba,I regret to inform you that I am returning your computer. I've managed to beat the deadline for returning the computer by 4 days. Amazon has agreed to pick-up your slack and refund me my money.  This is the second Toshiba I've owned and oddly enough they both have the same problem. My battery should charge when I plug in my power supply. I should not have to turn the computer off, take the battery out, push the power button for 30 seconds, do a rain dance and say 5 prayers to get my computer to run right every time I take it off the charger.I commend you on your selection of your customer service company you outsourced to. I was not fooled though, "Ivan" sounded suspiciously Asian. I do not dislike Asians, but don't try to fool me by tagging them with a different name. Some of my best friends are Asian or of Asian decent. I digress.... back to the topic at hand.After purchasing your computer I immediately had problems. Your website said I needed to change the power supply. I did and there was no change in status. Computer still broken.  I tried your all wise website again. It felt I needed to try changing the power supply.... again. No, I'll take the guy with the heavy accent this time. After an hour of waiting and being transferred, the guy was very polite and actually a good credit to your company as I have said earlier, but he was only authorized to tell me to send my computer away to a service center and inform me that I'll get it back in a few weeks.  No thank you. I can do without coffee for a few weeks. I can go without human interaction for weeks. I can't do without quick books for even a few days.  "Please send me a new computer so that I may transfer files and YOU can have the broken one," I said. Better yet, "Give me a refund so that I may purchase a different brand. You can still have your broken computer."Ivan was nice enough to inform me that I had run out of decisions on his end and that repairing their broken computer would still cost me two to three weeks of downtime.  The best he could offer me was an address to Toshiba in California where I could write a letter and let it rot on someone's desk. No thanks, I'm hoping this gets your attention sooner than that snail mail letter.In case you want to find me, you can look up my contact information through my computer serial number which is 8D338950Q.Sincerely,JPL

Reviews.Title: died after 1st update
Reviews.Author: Cheryl J Hoye
Reviews.Content: owned 2 weeks; received auto update, lost all programing. While I'd not purchase a Toshiba, I'll be happy to deal with JC Connections, they were super.

Reviews.Title: no good
Reviews.Author: millie
Reviews.Content: I bought this labtop and I have to send it back in one day noyhing was install on it.i would not recommend thia to no one

Reviews.Title: garbage
Reviews.Author: Cherie Walker
Reviews.Content: I have had this laptop less than a month and the camera stopped working, screen freeze and countless other issues..I am so disgusted.

Reviews.Title: battery in poor condition
Reviews.Author: Jose Alvarez
Reviews.Content: After receiving the product and review it, I realized that the battery did not work. No charge. Can not find the way to get a rehearing of this because when you buy one understood what he was doing for a new computer and in good condition.

Reviews.Title: great for a laptop
Reviews.Author: Mason Harvey
Reviews.Content: this Toshiba is great for a laptop, bought it for my son who takes it to school, I use it time to time

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: annette lark
Reviews.Content: very nice computer for the price. Not sure on Windows 8. Just have to get used to using it. Thank you

Reviews.Title: A nice laptop, however
Reviews.Author: David W. Sego "Dave"
Reviews.Content: I am not a tech head. I wanted a simple, reliable  laptop. I really like what this machine has to offer for the price but (here it comes) timing is every thing. I recently moved to Costa Rica for business. I ordered this laptop on line from Amazon and had it delivered to my business partners home in the states. I would pick it up while I was back in the states before Christmas. I got the laptop and it worked fine. Windows 8 is a pain but I could not find a laptop like this with Windows 7, anyway it would not charge. So I went on the Toshiba tech line and they say bad AC charge cord so they send me that. Still no charge so I go on line again to them and they say bad battery. By now it is 3 days before Christmas and there is no way I can get my replacement battery before Christmas because I flew back to Costa Rica Christmas day. You know, when you buy something expensive (to me a laptop is expensive) it should work. This battery thing has cost me allot of time and trouble since I tried to buy a battery before I left the states. No battery!

Reviews.Title: Decent budget laptop.
Reviews.Author: AndThen
Reviews.Content: Good choice for a budget laptop at under $230 w/ BB bundle.Decent for the price.Celeron chip is Ivy Bridge, low-ish power consumption.. (though get a Haswell if you really want battery life)Very quiet.. stays cool.I like that the keyboard has large keys... I mistype less on full size keys than island style chiclet keys.Keyboard is okay... if you press down lightly, the keys might not register though.... not as tactile as it should be but not horrible.Webcam is decent quality considering the price of this thing.The speakers are.... well they exist, and sound comes out of them.  If you have much higher expectations than that... I would look elsewhere.  You'd probably want to use earphones/headphones or plug in speakers if you're listening to music.Battery life good for a budget laptop.6 hours of battery life when not doing anything.. idling with the screen on (...cough Lenovo actually uses these numbers in its advertisement...)4-5 Hours of light use battery life...typing up a document, light browsing, reading3 Hours of video watchingSo, decent battery life considering Toshiba is advertising 4...and you actually get 4.  I get half the advertised battery life with my Lenovo.Chassis is a bit big.  Feels like Toshiba could have made this a lot thinner without adding any cost.Budget build quality is really budget.. The whole thing feels hollow.  There's space between the lid and the LCD..So you press behind the screen/on the laptop lid and there's some good room/flex. Lots and lots of room between the system board and the shell too, i think..Could've at least took out a quarter inch from the shell/chassis design while using all the same components.. thinner laptop that isn't any more expensive.Much much much better than the disaster budget HP 630 laptop i bought 2 years ago for $330... that I still use.If you'd a more future-oriented laptop, look for one with USB 3.0 and a Intel 4th generation Haswell chip... Haswell will get you a nice battery life boost..Sound issues with the headphone jack/port can be fixed by fiddling with the sound drivers and/or DTS sound software.If i remember correctly, by default something with the software is screwed up and DTS sound software wasn't switching its modes when you plug in ear/headphones.

Reviews.Title: A good buy for the price.
Reviews.Author: JCliff
Reviews.Content: This computer has its pros and cons.  First, the pros.  If you are just needing a simple computer to get on the internet and do Microsoft office things (word,excel) then this computer works great.  It is pretty user friendly once you figure out how to make Windows 8 act like Windows 7 and it is pretty fast to.  Also, after all the research I did this computer seemed to be the best computer for the lowest price.Now the cons.  The cons are more annoyances that can be lived with. First, the mouse pad is pretty sensitive.  If you start on the far right side and scroll to your left the start menu will automatically come up.  This can be annoying at first but you just have to train yourself not to to start over so far.  Second, the keyboard is not sensitive enough.  Countless times I have spelled a word wrong because the keyboard didn't pick up that I had typed a letter even though it felt like I had and I felt the key move.  I have just had to learn to be a little harder typer than on my last computer.  Lastly, Windows 8 is annoying.  It is trying to be like Apple with all of its apps but it falls far short of that goal.  Hopefully this will not improve but continue its downward spiral and Windows will just get rid of this idea and give me my old non-app windows OS again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Mike Eastwood
Reviews.Content: Great laptop, no issues and my wife love this. I will purchase another one soon for my business. It was easy to order, shipped fast and was easy to set up. this is a must buy if your looking for a laptop.Mike

Reviews.Title: worst piece of garbage
Reviews.Author: Robbie Rodrigues
Reviews.Content: I hate this computer.  My sons iPad mini has better sound than this piece of crap and it makes you use the smart screen set up as well as the desktop set up and always swipes and switches programs whether you want it to or not.  Do not be fooled into buying this laptop.  In fact if your interested please email me and I will sell you mine so I can buy something different.

Reviews.Title: laptop heaven
Reviews.Author: thomas r.
Reviews.Content: I brought for my wife, she loves it. just didn't like window 8. but met all her needs.games, ,movies,  its great

Reviews.Title: Will not boot up
Reviews.Author: CCP
Reviews.Content: The device will not boot up. I had to return it for and exchange, which I am still waiting for.

Reviews.Title: expected better
Reviews.Author: Rashed Ghandour
Reviews.Content: it is supposed to be a simple laptop, however windows 8 and the touch on the scroll pad make things complicated. I find it very hard at times to do what i wana do without different screens popping up. If you are used to windows 8 or know  how to deal with it, i guess you should be fine with it

Reviews.Title: A few small bugs but overall great!
Reviews.Author: Kelley Scribner
Reviews.Content: This laptop was a last-minute purchase that I was forced to make after my old one died in the middle of finals week, forcing me to get what I could afford from BestBuy. My biggest concern is that the touchpad will disable itself after some Toshiba updates, so I had to dig out an old mouse to use in order to re-enable it in the settings. My only other complaint is that it doesn't use a bent power cord (the part the plugs in sticks straight out instead of bending at a 90 degree angle in order to hug the side of the laptop) but that's more of a preference thing based on how my desk is set up.That said, I really like the laptop; the keyboard is very comfortable (and the caps lock and num lock keys have lights that turn on when you press them so you can know if they're on, which is very convenient for me) and I really like where the various jacks and drives are located. Windows 8 started out with a learning curve, but after a little while, I find some of it's features are rather convenient.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase.
Reviews.Author: kara
Reviews.Content: I like Toshibas, I like this computer. The only downfall is windows 8. I despise it! I hate the apps I avoid them in all ways possible. After changing some default settings and having it for three months now it's a lot better. It is a lot to get used to.. but the computer itself is awesome. I would buy this again, but maybe with windows 7.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive Yet Poeerful
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Llewellyn "Gadget Freak NJ"
Reviews.Content: I like this better than the prior 2 HP laptops I owned. It is quick and reliable. It has great battery life. I am very pleased with its perfoance and low cost.

Reviews.Title: Just what I ordered
Reviews.Author: Charles Altizer
Reviews.Content: Good machine for the money. Arrived over night. That was the best surprise. It does everything I need in a computer.

Reviews.Title: yep, stars
Reviews.Author: Jema
Reviews.Content: This is a great little "extra" machine to have hanging around. For the price I paid I am very very happy with it. Yes I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: my last Satellite
Reviews.Author: SJFC Ed.D.
Reviews.Content: I've been buying Satellite laptops since the mid 90's.  Great value, robust construction, always comes with useful software utilities.  Until this one.  Windows 8...... I can't say what an absolute disaster this is.  Out of the box, before you can do anything, Windows 8 forces you to open a Microsoft email account....before you can do anything else.  Dealing with Windows 8?  Picture yourself with a keyboard and mouse, working with an operating system designed for touch screen.  And all the useful utility software that used to come with a Satellite.....forget it, they deleted it all, stripped this computer to the bone.  No Moviemaker, no Toshiba disc copy, not hardly anything at all.I gave this computer to my sister-in-law who knows very little about computers, and will just use it for email only (though not with a forced Microsoft email account).  I will use my older Toshiba Satellite (Windows 7) until it works no more.....then look at good deals in other brands.If this computer is the future of Toshiba Satellites, then I would call it a dim future indeed.  I can't say what a disappointment this purchase was.

Reviews.Title: Defective Battery
Reviews.Author: Jerry Higley
Reviews.Content: It works fine when it is plugged in, but the battery has never worked.  I would like to primarily use it for traveling, and a working battery would be helpful.

Reviews.Title: I returned this.
Reviews.Author: Lynne D Cruger
Reviews.Content: The computer would not charge. The quality of materials was so poor, I wondered if it was a knockoff. I've owned other Toshiba products which I've loved so this was a major disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Katherine
Reviews.Content: The computer it self is great. Does everything I need it to do but the outside of it looks very cheap and feels like plastic.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba satelite
Reviews.Author: angels anderson
Reviews.Content: My toshiba satelite works great , I bought it for christmas for my familyand they enjoy it windows is great got free up grade to 8 , have no problemswith it at all.,

Reviews.Title: problems
Reviews.Author: davidzaffke
Reviews.Content: i bought this as a christmas gift and when the person went to use it it wouldn't charge up. we contacted toshiba and what a night mare. when i buy a product i expect good service and was totally unhappy with how toshiba handled this. they need to have people who know these products and can do the right thing.

Reviews.Title: Good Laptop but sound is not stereo on headphones
Reviews.Author: Daniel Goncalves Gago
Reviews.Content: It's a good laptop, but the sound output is very low, think it's mono, however it is a good laptop.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite C55-A5300 15.6" Laptop PC
Reviews.Author: rifv15
Reviews.Content: Good laptop. Fast, lots of memory. A bit odd uploading the programs. Seems like the computer just quit, so stay with it and when in doubt, restart it. Excellent for the price. Works great.

Reviews.Title: great little laptop!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Roark
Reviews.Content: this is the third email survey asking me how I like my new Toshiba. seems like a lot of surveys  :-)

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: joann
Reviews.Content: I love it.  I just can't get along without a laptop.  This is so much better than the one I had.  I haven't had any trouble with using windows 8.

Reviews.Title: Met expectations.
Reviews.Author: Gary Dagan
Reviews.Content: The computer meets all my expectations, great for the price. I hope it lasts longer than my old Toshiba, which died on me about a week after the warranty expired. This is my first exposure to Windows 8. Takes some getting used to.Not the computer's fault.

Reviews.Title: Only worth the $230 I paid for it.
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Got it on sale at Best buy for my girlfriend... Specs looked good, and after having HP laptops for the longest time, decided to go Toshiba since my moms always looked like it was quality. Anyway MY computer crapped out on me so now I've been using this new one... enough to really get to know it. There's really nothing good I can say about it lol. Buttons don't seem to work half the time... there's some weird mouse lag after I scroll.... and even browsing the web seems like it's too much for this thing sometimes, Not sure if it's a windows 8 problem or me just having too much stuff going on. I'm not really great with computers but through the years I've at least been able to keep up on monthly maintenance (or whatever you want to say) and keep it somewhat clean and smooth running but this thing seems like there's one thing after another and ugh, windows 8. Windows 8 has caused me much grief. the photo album is entirely different, actually all old media things are completely different and limits it's use...Soooo in all I will say this computer will be ok for someone like my Gfriend who will use it occasionally for school or web surfing, but I spend probly 10x the amount of time on it (especially when I'm laidoff) and found it to be "less than" haha. Had high hopes for you toshiba, and hey maybe it's my own ignorance, but I think I'll go back to HP or try lenovo or something... but yeah, those button and mouse problems do really irritate me though. Good Luck!!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Kathi Wilker
Reviews.Content: This laptop is a nice size and weight, the battery lasts longer than I thought it would last, very clear colors on the screen. I really like that there is a separate keypad on the right side.  I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Not an Improvement
Reviews.Author: JMW
Reviews.Content: This is the first Windows 8 machine I have used, and so I cannot say to what extent my dislike of this computer stems from its operating system and to what extent from the quality of the hardware.  The computer loads noticeably slower than my three-year-old Dell Latitude, even though Consumer Reports referred to this as a speedy computer.Windows 8 and the entire software environment perform poorly, if, on balance, good enough for my purposes.  This is not a touch-screen model computer so it is hard to blame Windows 8 for not performing at its optimum, given that it is clearly the first Windows intended to run and exploit the new smartphone/touch screen norm.  Even so, the computer loads the various sidebars slowly, and gets rid of them slowly, so that one often feels as if the screen is being obscured and spilling out icons that interfere with one's use of the computer.If one goes to the traditional Windows screen, it works okay, but sometimes one gets, for one reason or another (i.e. for one of several discernible reasons) thrown back to the START screen.  I thought this experience would lessen in frequency or annoyance with time, but we've had this computer for nearly two months now and are still irritated by the way it functions.The main thing I bought this computer for is the speed, and that hasn't impressed.  I still do not like the feel of the keyboard two months in, though I must say it is better to the touch than that array of laptops that has begun creating low, spaced, or virtual keys.I paid way less than even the relatively low amazon price for this: price drove the purchase.  Not a bad deal, but I probably wouldn't repeat it.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba laptop
Reviews.Author: Michael Szerokman
Reviews.Content: I love the computer. Its does everything its supposed to do. I use it in a small business and I would definitely buy another one.

Reviews.Title: This commuter is absolutely great I really love it!
Reviews.Author: shopper 1
Reviews.Content: It's fast, not pretty but so what! Some reviewers thought it felt and looked cheap. I think it looks and feels practical. I do not need a fancy pretty computer.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the product. The price is good. I don't need something expensive. The frequency response is reasonable. It works great.

Reviews.Title: Just Okay
Reviews.Author: Preston
Reviews.Content: If you are on a budget and don't need to run any powerful programs this maybe the laptop for you.  I bought it on sale for 229.00 + tax.  I took it back because it was not the Toshiba quality i was used to.  It is the cheapest i have ever paid for any laptop and it will get the job done but you will sacrifice for cheap build quality and semi low outdated specs.  I would recommend this for someone on very tight budget or someone who mainly surfs the web.  But it did run Photoshop well and the boot time was approx. 30 sec., which is impressive, windows 8 is quit snappy.  As far as windows 8 goes, i am not a fan, but if you install classic shell and adjust some settings you can get it to run like windows 7.  so it wasn't right for me. but it very well may be good for you.

Reviews.Title: Just the Basics
Reviews.Author: gch3
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift.  It is intended for addressing just the basics - e-mail, web surfing, Skype, Facebook and the like.  For those things, it is just what was needed.  The Windows 8 features take some getting used to, but it seems to be working out well.  This laptop is not going to handle complex functions, but it more than handles the basics.

Reviews.Title: Good for general use.
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: I don't do anything fancy, ie graphics, games etc.  This is a good computer for home finances and scanning the internet.  Slight problem getting used to Windows 8, but slowly starting to adapt.

Reviews.Title: Decent laptop if you can get it cheaply
Reviews.Author: satellite779
Reviews.Content: This is a decent basic laptop for average user. It's not the sexiest, but it does everything reasonably well. It would be a good laptop for your parents or grandparents (providing they are not power users). However, I would say it's not a good buy for the current price listed here. I paid half the current price on clearance.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop
Reviews.Author: Eric Beschinski
Reviews.Content: No complaints (aside from Windows 8, but the machine can't be blamed for that). Exactly as posted plus a great value.

Reviews.Title: TOSHIBA SATELITE
Reviews.Author: juanita
Reviews.Content: I WAS VERY SATISFIED WITH THIS PRODUCT.  IT WAS A GIFT, THEY HAVE INJOY IT.  I LOOK FORWORD TO DOING BUSINESS IN THE FUTURE.  THANK YOU  JUANITA  HARRISON

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite C55-A5300 15.6" Laptop PC
Reviews.Author: Pamela H.
Reviews.Content: The web cam and sound are not to my liking but I am sure Toshiba has better models.  I have had my Toshiba 7 Starter notebook for 6 years and am happy to have found a great geek to find my missing components that I accidentally uninstalled.Happy New Year,Pamela

Reviews.Title: HATE Win8, annoying things happen
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: The computer holds up well, it looks nice. But I do NOT like Win8. With a laptop, you use the touchpad to move your mouse pointer around and for some reason they made it so if you move the arrow right, the left menu pops open over whatever you are doing or working on. If you swipe right, the left menu pops out. It is so so so annoying. The settings are not user-friendly either. For someone who has mediocre knowledge of computers, it was difficult to get things set to look halfway normal like the old Win XP. Oh, and instead of moving the arrow like you want to, sometimes the screen will zoom in and out or the menus that pop out will select an option without you clicking on anything at all. I am not a fan. Too many annoying little things like that. It should be simple enough, move your finger around the touchpad and the mouse pointer moves around the screen. Not a fan.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba PC
Reviews.Author: Sandra Lightholder
Reviews.Content: It's my second Toshiba u purchase. I use it for my business and surfing the net.  I use it all the time and love it. Sandra love it. Sandra

Reviews.Title: Bought for daughter in college.
Reviews.Author: George W. Ireland
Reviews.Content: Bought for daughter in college.  She loves it so how can I not give it 5 stars?  I gave it to her Chritmas morning and had already set it up for her a couple days before.  Easy setup and great display!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Lap Top for a great price
Reviews.Author: Charles A.
Reviews.Content: SO far so good, this lap top was purchased for my son for Xmas, he loves his lap top and has no issues with it.Thank you very much! I will purchase from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas Gifts
Reviews.Author: Yvonne A. Benson
Reviews.Content: So happy to have this for Christmas.  Very nice so far.  Now I just have to figure out how to navigate

Reviews.Title: Nice computer for the price I paid
Reviews.Author: crystal hunter
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop for my daughter. She loves it! She is able to Skype with her friends, watch movies, and play The Simms which was really why I bought the laptop. It came on time and was packaged nicely.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Renee
Reviews.Content: Bought its has a gift for my little brother an he really like , it's not too heavyOverall great

Reviews.Title: It worth the price
Reviews.Author: Nestor
Reviews.Content: Great laptop ! It has a very high performance, just for what I needed for. Highly recomended for work at home.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba reliable as usual
Reviews.Author: Jean-Guy Momy
Reviews.Content: This is my third Toshiba laptop over the past few years, and as usual it's never failed me.  I would have given it 5 starts was it not for the fact that it had Windows 8

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Kevin F. McNeill
Reviews.Content: good value .... I just don't get windows 8 yet .... kind of a headache, but that's me - not the laptop

Reviews.Title: Okay for the price
Reviews.Author: Dan D
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my soon-to-be-going-to-college-son.  It's a decent computer for the price and hopefully it will last a long time.  Everything booted up properly, and I upgraded to Windows 8.1 (seems to be problematic in some areas, but that's a different topic).  My only complaint, if you can call it that, is that the computer does not "feel" like it's solid.  It seems kinda "plastic-y".  Compared to all of the other laptops I've owned or worked with, this has much more plastic.  Other than that, I really can't complain about it, yet.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Joseph Boyer
Reviews.Content: I had to order a new battery from Toshiba which temporarily cost 100.00, but since it was under warranty, you just have to mail back the bad battery it came with(which is why I think I got it for 314.00) and they will refund your money. The new battery got here the next day so it wasn't much of a hassle since they send you a prepaid shipping label but for $314.00 and a little problem I cant complain. Its a nice laptop for the price I would definitely recommend this. The DVD player does look very fragile and can easily break but other than that everything else is extremely well built and it's very fast too!

Reviews.Title: just a computer
Reviews.Author: Clay Beard
Reviews.Content: Got hear on time and works like a computer should work.. its a Christmas present ill get back to you for a update.

Reviews.Title: Good System for the money
Reviews.Author: Michael Fields
Reviews.Content: Good value. It is a little slower then I expected but since it is configured for minimum memory is understandable. I got it to drive movies and tv shows on my tv and it is perfect for that.

Reviews.Title: didn't work
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: We purchased two but one of them had to be sent to toshiba for repair as soon as we recieved laptop.

Reviews.Title: overpriced loook around first before buying something
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: this laptop is grossly over priced. this one is alto better and cheaper [...] linked laptop has 2 more gigs of ram pratically a ghz faster processor and 30 dollars cheaper

Reviews.Title: Toshiba laptop
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Delivery was excellent. I do not like too much Windows 8. I will have to get used to it but I will never order a computer with Microsoft Windows 8 installed.

Reviews.Title: Great computer.
Reviews.Author: Irene R.
Reviews.Content: Great laptop for the price. I am still learning my way around Windows 8 but the computer is working just fine. Glad I choose this one. It replaces my old Toshiba Satellite which is still working after 7 years but ran out of memory.

Reviews.Title: Good quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: Exceeded my expectations for the price. Not exactly a laptop for heavy duty work, but as a leisure computer, it's perfect and very affordable.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Prevented My Death.
Reviews.Author: Robert Ramos
Reviews.Content: Let me just say, when I ordered this Laptop I was pretty sure I'd be recording my suicide letter on it's extremely well functioning webcam mounted on the screen. Considering my ex and I had just broken up, I was sure that spending a whopping 273$ was a steal I couldn't afford to miss out on before offing myself. After making the purchase, I grew into a huge depression/excitement at the prospect of a new laptop which I'm sure would be passed on to my brother but I digress. I was given a two week delivery wait, which seemed pretty good considering it's the first laptop I've ever owned!Well wouldn't you look at at that, it came in only a week earlier than anticipated, I tell ya my mother has never seen me so happy in such a long time. I even began kissing the box, death was approaching at my pace as I had already bought a bottle of scotch and some sleeping pills, both of which I had never taken in my life time. Looking back on it now, it seems silly.Opening the package, the laptop was secured with large bubble wrap and plastic wrapping which I gave to my sister as my final gift to her as I was soon to leave Earth.After going through all the hoops to create a Microsoft account and actually START up Windows 8 I have to say that this laptop runs extremely smoothly. The interface is simple and it comes with a bunch of apps that I don't really use, however I find myself using SKYPE more than usual to chat with friends.For the most part the keyboard is evenly spaced and a comfortable fit for my hands. I have steam on this laptop and play various games, however nothing that would demand too much from it such as Left 4 Dead and Thief 3.All of the features on this laptop were nigh overwhelming nor underwhelming; I was quite whelmed.I would give this product a 5/5 for it's delivery time and efficiency, however I wasted a good 50 bucks making preparations for my suicide which this laptop was supposed to be used to explain.My depression has been out shined by busyness.Thanks Toshiba, but you owe me 50$good laptop thx

Reviews.Title: Batt\ery will not hold a charge
Reviews.Author: alison
Reviews.Content: Have had it plugged in for hours yet as soon as it is unplugged it turns off.  If I wanted a desktop I would have bought one!

Reviews.Title: Not top pleased!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M Powell
Reviews.Content: This laptop was absolutely terrible, I worked with it for several days and ended up totally frustrated and ended up returning it to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS REFURBISHED!
Reviews.Author: Phil Anosike
Reviews.Content: I unfortunately got this refurbished, which is neither new nor used. It's more inbetween. But when I got it, first thing I noticed is that the Laptop Heavily depended on the AC cord. The moment I unplugged it the laptop would immediately shutdown!  It has literally 0% battery power everytime it's on. To make matters worse, it took about 5-6 minutes just for the computer to start up and show the menu. And to browse and simply go to facebook was a hassle.  It kept crashing, not responding and some sites were inaccessible to go to. This laptop was so bad on every level. I had to call the tech support and they told me it had been hijacked by a virus named conduit. And I just used this laptop for 2 days, on the 2nd day I called tech support. Luckily, I already shipped this piece of junk back to the seller and will be getting my refund back. I don't know how the New Toshiba laptop is, but this kind of ruined my chances of getting it. I purchased an HP Laptop instead.

Reviews.Title: russian roullet
Reviews.Author: arl6969 "arl6969"
Reviews.Content: I bought this ltpc at bess buy for $300.00 the sales person said it was the best for the money(so much for sales people...most of them would sell there souls)I really like the outer shell cause it hid the fingerprints ,I did'nt get into it to far(1 week) when I found I had to have it plugged in to work at all!!!!Took it back to a different best buy and this salesman said that they were having alot of this model coming back for the battery issue,I swear to GOD as I was standing there a lady showed up with the same problem(now I ask you.what are the odds for that!!)This salesman said that the higher end toshiba's were excellent ltpc's but I'am on a budget so I got a HP2000 and I'am glad I did---it is a very good ltpc for $300.00Have had it for 2months now with-out problems and it is user friendly

Reviews.Title: the laptop Toshiba Satelite c55-A5300
Reviews.Author: Hany
Reviews.Content: The laptop pc is good and very fast, and this site provides a good service and l get very quick thank you for sell.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Laptop
Reviews.Author: Jenna
Reviews.Content: Perfect. Great purchase and I definitely didn't miss out on the Black Friday deals. Got it fast and it works great :)

Reviews.Title: Will never order this from here again!!!!! Rip Off  BEWARE!!!! Scam!!!
Reviews.Author: Kim. Stroup
Reviews.Content: I ordered this computer and paid $ 436.90 and quickly realized I could get a better deal in stores. I barely barely opened the box never unwrapped a single item to make sure I had the right model # and quickly closed the package back up. I went through Amazon followed the return process only to find out that I had to pay another 20.00 to return this item. To throw salt in my wounds I'm now being charged 122.40 restocking fee!!!!  I shipped the computer to your home!!! Your residence how can you possibly have a restocking fee?  I could open it use it and bring it back to Best Buy for no charge.... This transaction cost me 142.40 not acceptable!  Shame on this company for robbing people and shame on you Amazon for allowing this type of business under your name.

Reviews.Title: PIECE OF CRAP
Reviews.Author: chaser12
Reviews.Content: i used this laptop once and it wouldnt charge and the battery was cracked i really hate it so i threw it out the windowq

Reviews.Title: It does good job for the price
Reviews.Author: Dennis W. Strom "Swede"
Reviews.Content: Always have purchased Toshiba laptops computes ,main reason they last a long and keep on working with little or no up keep.

Reviews.Title: I don't like it!!!
Reviews.Author: BreOsha
Reviews.Content: Because when I ordered it, the product packaging said it was touch screen, but it's not!!!!! I hate this laptop so MUCH!!!

Reviews.Title: Toshiba lap top
Reviews.Author: john keaney
Reviews.Content: It did not conform to my expectation about this lap top everything. Went wrong from downloading to try to log on. I had to return back to toshiba/USA  trust me it was a nightmare to explane to toshiba what was wrong with the laptop  They finally caved in not mention  that still a warrenty for almost a entire a whole year  regardless still I have to pay  Shipping/ handling fees so they can findaprolem with the laptop and that note I (what  ever the outcome will be)  I do wish to purchase any electronic from your company again(amazon) any more

Reviews.Title: TOSHIBA C55-A5300!
Reviews.Author: Salvatore J. Mangano
Reviews.Content: The laptop is too slow. Biggest complaint is Windows 8 . This has got be the worst MS program ever. Fine if you have a touch screen. Bring back WINDOWS  7 or XP.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: This is a steal compared to buying other laptops! It is a great size and amazing windows 8 included! Get this if you want an amazing, cheap, and sturdy laptop!

Reviews.Title: Battery didn't work
Reviews.Author: Larry Witt
Reviews.Content: When we got the laptop, it worked fine as long as it was plugged in.  But it would not charge the battery.  The troubleshooting said it was the AC adaptor so we ordered a new one.  I got the new adapter and there was no change. so i called technical support.  that guy diagnosed the problem as the battery.  Ordered a new battery and now it works great.  Too bad it couldn't have worked great right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: this is best laptop in thoshiba i like this
Reviews.Author: jayesh j chaudhari
Reviews.Content: nice laptop pc nootbook good wark in my home I bay befor 1 manth so good all this is best

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Isaac Moscoso
Reviews.Content: This laptop at first I didn't get it but now it's one of my favorite electronics fast and very quick but somewhat complicated not the system but the os

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: hotaewang
Reviews.Content: I'm not too familar with Windows 8, but other than that, this laptop is great with awesome price.  I like it.

Reviews.Title: this laptop sucks
Reviews.Author: radu poliac
Reviews.Content: do not, I repeat, do not but this laptop. comes full of garbage programs you do not need and is slower than the 6 year old dell I was trying to replace. Waste of money.

Reviews.Title: I hate it
Reviews.Author: Michelle Ann Beezley
Reviews.Content: I hate this computer. I want to run over it with my truck.do not buy it...save your money and do not buy

Reviews.Title: Good cheap laptop.
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: Cheap laptop for basic demands. This machine can run almost common sofwares. such as mircosoft office, photoshop, firefox, chrome (under 20 tabs). If you want a really strong laptop for expert demands, you can see Lenovo G500B00CRXZUCQ

Reviews.Title: Who can help?
Reviews.Author: Selina
Reviews.Content: What link can I use to upgrade my audio drivers for this exact computer I don't want to mess it up! I'm sure ultra 64 can help please and thank u;)

Reviews.Title: Got the command module but still waiting for the physical satellite
Reviews.Author: JoshAshton
Reviews.Content: Yes, I know, I should have known better, but still, I trust Amazon and I trust FBA, so when I saw that someone was selling a satellite, I jumped at the opportunity to get it. Well, silly me. I got a control panel, but no satellite. And it has already been over a month!!!!

Reviews.Title: Worst purchase ever
Reviews.Author: Nicolas
Reviews.Content: I recently bought a brand new Toshiba Satellite C55 and it was my worst purchase ever. The Wifi conection could not be slower. I've looked up in some forums and it seems to be a common problem for Toshiba users... in my case I tried everything but it still doesn't work. Plus, the mousepad stopped working after a couple of weeks. Finally, the customer support did not give me any answer. Toshiba, never again.

Reviews.Title: look elsewhere
Reviews.Author: Markie Twain "Markie"
Reviews.Content: This thing stinks. Full of bloatware, the new windows stinks, it was slow as all getout. Avoid at all costs.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Bill Scott
Reviews.Content: All in all, I have had great luck with Toshiba.  The (refurbished) laptop was delivered promptly and seemed to be just fine.  However, I could not get the wireless to work effectively.  I uninstalled the device, re-installed, uninstalled the driver, re-installed, still could not get above .4 Ghz download.  Amazon made it wonderfully easy to return so I'm very happy I do business here.

Reviews.Title: Black friday
Reviews.Author: Preston Caldwell
Reviews.Content: wow you raised this price almost a $100 for black Friday I thought it worked the other way around but I guess you still sold them

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: omar alsaab
Reviews.Content: It was bad experience،، The battery is not charged and the device attached too much and too slow also. I did not like it

Reviews.Title: I'm not ever buying a Toshiba brand laptop or product!!!
Reviews.Author: RavenM
Reviews.Content: All I got to say is buy an HP laptop.The chassis was too thin it felt like it was going to crush or fall apart just from picking it up. & the speakers is the worst ever. The sound was crappy even when you turn up the volume still the same results. The technical support was not helpful as well. Toshiba don't fully explain all the buttons functions. I had more support on yahoo answers than the Toshiba site. And the laptop must not be compliant with windows 8 cause if you preview your photos It'll load up real slow.Save the headache buy a HP laptop!

Reviews.Title: they are cheap because of the processor
Reviews.Author: sal
Reviews.Content: to have a decent performance in an nowadays entry-level laptop you want it to feature at least a Core i3 processor. Anything below is past!

Reviews.Title: t volume is just to low cant enjoy my music from a nxt room an i hate that
Reviews.Author: Allison
Reviews.Content: the volume is really low to low for a laptopwas not expectin t volume to be so lowan i hate that about this computer
